@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@ - * Copyright (c) 2006, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. + * Copyright (c) 2006, 2025, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. @@ -37,0 +37,13 @@ + *

Compressor Usage

+ * An {@linkplain DeflaterInputStream input stream} that is created without specifying + * a {@linkplain Deflater compressor} will use a default compressor. The default + * compressor will be closed when the input stream is {@linkplain #close closed}. + *

+ * If a compressor is specified when creating the input stream, it is the + * responsibility of the caller to {@linkplain Deflater#close close} the + * compressor after closing the input stream. + * + * @apiNote + * The {@link #close} method should be called to release resources used by this + * stream, either directly, or with the {@code try}-with-resources statement. + * @@ -73,0 +86,3 @@ + *

+ * The default compressor will be closed when this input stream + * is {@linkplain #close() closed}. @@ -85,0 +101,4 @@ + *

+ * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this input stream + * {@linkplain ##compressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Deflater compressor}. @@ -97,0 +117,4 @@ + *

+ * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this input stream + * {@linkplain ##compressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Deflater compressor}. @@ -126,0 +150,1 @@ + @Override @@ -150,0 +175,1 @@ + @Override @@ -172,0 +198,1 @@ + @Override @@ -227,0 +254,1 @@ + @Override @@ -262,0 +290,1 @@ + @Override @@ -276,0 +305,1 @@ + @Override @@ -285,0 +315,1 @@ + @Override @@ -294,0 +325,1 @@ + @Override

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@ - * Copyright (c) 1996, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. + * Copyright (c) 1996, 2025, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. @@ -41,0 +41,13 @@ + *

Compressor Usage

+ * An {@linkplain DeflaterOutputStream output stream} that is created without specifying + * a {@linkplain Deflater compressor} will use a default compressor. The default + * compressor will be closed when the output stream is {@linkplain #close closed}. + *

+ * If a compressor is specified when creating the output stream, it is the + * responsibility of the caller to {@linkplain Deflater#close close} the + * compressor after closing the output stream. + * + * @apiNote + * The {@link #close} method should be called to release resources used by this + * stream, either directly, or with the {@code try}-with-resources statement. + * @@ -66,0 +79,4 @@ + *

+ * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this output stream + * {@linkplain ##compressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Deflater compressor}. @@ -101,1 +118,5 @@ - * the 4-argument constructor DeflaterOutputStream(out, def, size, false). + * the 4-argument constructor {@code DeflaterOutputStream(out, def, size, false)}. + *

+ * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this output stream + * {@linkplain ##compressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Deflater compressor}. @@ -115,0 +136,4 @@ + *

+ * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this output stream + * {@linkplain ##compressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Deflater compressor}. @@ -138,1 +163,5 @@ - * the 3-argument constructor DeflaterOutputStream(out, def, false). + * the 3-argument constructor {@code DeflaterOutputStream(out, def, false)}. + *

+ * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this output stream + * {@linkplain ##compressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Deflater compressor}. @@ -153,0 +182,3 @@ + *

+ * The default compressor will be closed when this output stream + * is {@linkplain #close() closed}. @@ -172,1 +204,4 @@ - * the 2-argument constructor DeflaterOutputStream(out, false). + * the 2-argument constructor {@code DeflaterOutputStream(out, false)}. + *

+ * The default compressor will be closed when this output stream + * is {@linkplain #close() closed}. @@ -187,0 +222,1 @@ + @Override @@ -201,0 +237,1 @@ + @Override @@ -242,0 +279,1 @@ + * @@ -244,0 +282,1 @@ + @Override @@ -299,0 +338,1 @@ + @Override

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@ - * Copyright (c) 1996, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. + * Copyright (c) 1996, 2025, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved. @@ -41,0 +41,14 @@ + * + *

Decompressor Usage

+ * An {@linkplain InflaterInputStream input stream} that is created without specifying + * a {@linkplain Inflater decompressor} will use a default decompressor. The default + * decompressor will be closed when the input stream is {@linkplain #close closed}. + *

+ * If a decompressor is specified when creating the input stream, it is the + * responsibility of the caller to {@linkplain Inflater#close close} the + * decompressor after closing the input stream. + * + * @apiNote + * The {@link #close} method should be called to release resources used by this + * stream, either directly, or with the {@code try}-with-resources statement. + * @@ -78,0 +92,5 @@ + *

+ * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this input stream + * {@linkplain ##decompressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Inflater decompressor}. + * @@ -97,0 +116,5 @@ + *

+ * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this input stream + * {@linkplain ##decompressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Inflater decompressor}. + * @@ -108,0 +132,4 @@ + *

+ * The default decompressor will be closed when this input stream + * is {@linkplain #close() closed}. + * @@ -123,0 +151,1 @@ + @Override @@ -154,0 +183,1 @@ + @Override @@ -196,0 +226,1 @@ + @Override @@ -223,0 +254,1 @@ + @Override @@ -249,0 +281,1 @@ + * @@ -251,0 +284,1 @@ + @Override @@ -290,0 +324,1 @@ + @Override

Decompressor Usage

+ * An {@linkplain InflaterOutputStream output stream} that is created without specifying + * a {@linkplain Inflater decompressor} will use a default decompressor. The default + * decompressor will be closed when the output stream is {@linkplain #close closed}. + *

+ * If a decompressor is specified when creating the output stream, it is the + * responsibility of the caller to {@linkplain Inflater#close close} the + * decompressor after closing the output stream. + * + * @apiNote + * The {@link #close} method should be called to release resources used by this + * stream, either directly, or with the {@code try}-with-resources statement. + * @@ -73,0 +86,3 @@ + *

+ * The default decompressor will be closed when this output stream + * is {@linkplain #close() closed}. @@ -85,0 +101,4 @@ + *

+ * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this output stream + * {@linkplain ##decompressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Inflater decompressor}. @@ -97,0 +117,4 @@ + *

+ * {@linkplain #close() Closing} this output stream + * {@linkplain ##decompressor-usage will not close} the given + * {@linkplain Inflater decompressor}. @@ -126,0 +150,1 @@ + @Override @@ -145,0 +170,1 @@ + @Override @@ -202,0 +228,1 @@ + @Override @@ -222,0 +249,1 @@ + @Override
